plot: An experimental work in which two women take turns filming each other as they swim through the pools of William Randalph Hearst's estate of San Simeon.
title: Pools
plot_es: An experimental work in which two women take turns filming each other as they swim through the pools of William Randalph Hearst's estate of San Simeon.
